sources.title: Jennifer
sources.description: Title: Jennifer Summary: Agnes Langsley gets a job, through Jim Hollis, as caretaker of an old and vacated estate. The owner's cousin, Jennifer, was the last occupant and mysteriously disappeared. Agnes soon begins... Directed by: Joel Newton Actors: Ida Lupino, Howard Duff, Robert Nichols Production Company: Allied Artists Pictures Release Date: 25 October 1953 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Agnes Langsley gets a job, through Jim Hollis, as caretaker of an old and vacated estate. The owner's cousin, Jennifer, was the last occupant and mysteriously disappeared. Agnes soon begins to believe that Jennifer was murdered and that Jilm, whom she has fallen in love with, is responsible.

sources.title: Jennifer (1953) Ida Lupino, Howard Duff, Robert Nichols - Film Noir
sources.description: Jennifer is a 1953 film noir directed by Joel Newton and starring Ida Lupino, Howard Duff, and Robert Nichols.   Time Out magazine (London) wrote of the film, "This is gothic romance crossed with early '50s noir, worth a look for the sake of the great Wong Howe. He tackles this B-picture with unfailing artistry, creating images that are strong without being showy, atmospheric yet perfectly naturalistic.   Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jennifer_(1953_film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: Agnes Langsley gets a job, through Jim Hollis, as caretaker of an old and vacated estate. The owner's cousin, Jennifer, was the last occupant and mysteriously disappeared. Agnes soon begins to believe that Jennifer was murdered and that Jilm, whom she has fallen in love with, is responsible.
metadata.Actors: Ida Lupino, Howard Duff, Robert Nichols
